original_title: Felicitation for Master Shi Fa Zhao
original_body_lines: Another felicitation ceremony was held at the Gangaramaya Temple in Colombo to honor Master Shi Fa Zhao, the Chief Abbot of the Buddha Tooth Relic Temple and Museum, and the Golden Pagoda Buddhist Temple in Singapore. Packs of dry rations were distributed among low-income families, and school bags and books were distributed among schoolchildren in view of the birthday of the Thera. The felicitation ceremony for Master Shi Fa Zhao was also held for helping and treating Gangaramaya Chief Prelate Ven. Galaboda Gnanissara Thera in Singapore. Pix by Nimalsiri Edirisinghe
